verbs.description: at boise synagogue candles prayers for peace shine light on [ARG1: a dark day] [ARG0: we] [V: gather] [ARGM-PRD: more determined than ever to never surrender to fear] said rabbi dan fink at a vigil in honor of the victims of the attack on a pittsburgh synagogue rabbi dan fink pittsburgh light u s congregation ahavath beth israel synagogue boise donald trump bill bones boise police president donald trump boise idaho idaho boise synagogue
